00074 static orxSTATUS orxFASTCALL orx_DefaultEventHandler(const orxEVENT *_pstEvent)
00075 {
00076   orxSTATUS eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00077 
00078   /* Checks */
00079   orxASSERT(_pstEvent->eType == orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM);
00080 
00081   /* Depending on event ID */
00082   switch(_pstEvent->eID)
00083   {
00084     /* Close event */
00085     case orxSYSTEM_EVENT_CLOSE:
00086     {
00087       /* Updates status */
00088       sbStopByEvent = orxTRUE;
00089 
00090       break;
00091     }
00092 
00093     default:
00094     {
00095       break;
00096     }
00097   }
00098 
00099   /* Done! */
00100   return eResult;
00101 }

00105 static void orxFASTCALL orx_MainSetup()
00106 {
00107   /* Adds module dependencies */
00108   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_PARAM);
00109   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_CLOCK);
00110   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_CONFIG);
00111   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_INPUT);
00112   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_EVENT);
00113   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_FILE);
00114   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_LOCALE);
00115   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_PLUGIN);
00116   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_OBJECT);
00117   orxModule_AddDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_PROFILER);
00118 
00119   orxModule_AddOptionalDependency(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orxMODULE_ID_SCREENSHOT);
00120 
00121   return;
00122 }

00154 static orxINLINE void orx_Execute(orxU32 _u32NbParams, orxSTRING _azParams[], const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00155 {
00156   /* Inits the Debug System */
00157   orxDEBUG_INIT();
00158 
00159   /* Checks */
00160   orxASSERT(_u32NbParams > 0);
00161   orxASSERT(_azParams != orxNULL);
00162   orxASSERT(_pfnRun != orxNULL);
00163 
00164   /* Registers main module */
00165   orxModule_Register(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orx_MainSetup, _pfnInit, _pfnExit);
00166 
00167   /* Stores run callback */
00168   spfnRun = _pfnRun;
00169 
00170   /* Registers all other modules */
00171   orxModule_RegisterAll();
00172 
00173   /* Calls all modules setup */
00174   orxModule_SetupAll();
00175 
00176   /* Sends the command line arguments to orxParam module */
00177   if(orxParam_SetArgs(_u32NbParams, _azParams) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00178   {
00179     NSAutoreleasePool *poPool;
00180 
00181     /* Allocates memory pool */
00182     poPool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00183 
00184     /* Launches application */
00185     UIApplicationMain(_u32NbParams, _azParams, nil, @"orxAppDelegate");
00186 
00187     /* Releases memory pool */
00188     [poPool release];
00189   }
00190 
00191   /* Done! */
00192   return;
00193 }

00212 static orxINLINE void orx_Execute(orxU32 _u32NbParams, orxSTRING _azParams[], const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00213 {
00214   /* Inits the Debug System */
00215   orxDEBUG_INIT();
00216 
00217   /* Checks */
00218   orxASSERT(_u32NbParams > 0);
00219   orxASSERT(_azParams != orxNULL);
00220   orxASSERT(_pfnRun != orxNULL);
00221 
00222   /* Registers main module */
00223   orxModule_Register(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orx_MainSetup, _pfnInit, _pfnExit);
00224 
00225   /* Registers all other modules */
00226   orxModule_RegisterAll();
00227 
00228   /* Calls all modules setup */
00229   orxModule_SetupAll();
00230 
00231   /* Sends the command line arguments to orxParam module */
00232   if(orxParam_SetArgs(_u32NbParams, _azParams) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00233   {
00234     /* Inits the engine */
00235     if(orxModule_Init(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00236     {
00237       /* Registers default event handler */
00238       orxEvent_AddHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00239 
00240       /* Displays help */
00241       if(orxParam_DisplayHelp() != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00242       {
00243         orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stPayload;
00244         orxSTATUS               eClockStatus, eMainStatus;
00245         orxBOOL                 bStop;
00246 
00247         /* Clears payload */
00248         orxMemory_Zero(&stPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00249 
00250         /* Main loop */
00251         for(bStop = orxFALSE, sbStopByEvent = orxFALSE;
00252             bStop == orxFALSE;
00253             bStop = ((sbStopByEvent != orxFALSE) || (eMainStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE) || (eClockStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE)) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE)
00254         {
00255           /* Sends frame start event */
00256           orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_START, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00257 
00258           /* Runs the engine */
00259           eMainStatus = _pfnRun();
00260 
00261           /* Updates clock system */
00262           eClockStatus = orxClock_Update();
00263 
00264           /* Sends frame stop event */
00265           orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_STOP, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00266 
00267           /* Updates frame counter */
00268           stPayload.u32FrameCounter++;
00269         }
00270       }
00271 
00272       /* Removes event handler */
00273       orxEvent_RemoveHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00274 
00275       /* Exits from engine */
00276       orxModule_Exit(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN);
00277     }
00278 
00279     /* Exits from all modules */
00280     orxModule_ExitAll();
00281   }
00282 
00283   /* Exits from the Debug system */
00284 
00285   orxDEBUG_EXIT();
00286 }

00290     #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00291     #include <windows.h>

00298 static orxINLINE void orx_WinExecute(const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00299 {
00300   #define orxMAX_ARGS 256
00301 
00302   int   argc;
00303   char *argv[orxMAX_ARGS];
00304   char *pcToken, *pcNextToken, *pcFirstDelimiters;
00305   LPSTR lpFullCmdLine;
00306 
00307   /* Gets full command line */
00308   lpFullCmdLine = GetCommandLineA();
00309 
00310   /* Starts with a double quote? */
00311   if(*orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(lpFullCmdLine) == '"')
00312   {
00313     /* Gets first delimiters */
00314     pcFirstDelimiters = "\"";
00315   }
00316   else
00317   {
00318     /* Gets first delimiters */
00319     pcFirstDelimiters = " ";
00320   }
00321 
00322   /* Process command line */
00323   for(argc = 0, pcNextToken = NULL, pcToken = strtok_s(lpFullCmdLine, pcFirstDelimiters, &pcNextToken);
00324       pcToken && (argc < orxMAX_ARGS);
00325       pcToken = strtok_s(NULL, " ", &pcNextToken))
00326   {
00327     argv[argc++] = pcToken;
00328   }
00329 
00330   /* Inits and executes orx */
00331   orx_Execute(argc, argv, _pfnInit, _pfnRun, _pfnExit);
00332 }
00333 
00334     #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00335 
00336   #endif /* __orxANDROID_NATIVE__ */
